duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain customer relationships through sales and negotiation of LTL freight and semi loads.
Develop sales strategies to acquire new clients and expand the customer base.
Coordinate shipments, track deliveries, and ensure customer satisfaction during the freight transportation process.
Provide expertise in managing LTL freight and semi load logistics, ensuring efficient and cost-effective transportation solutions.
Stay informed about market trends, competitive rates, and industry regulations to make informed business decisions.
Adhere to compliance standards and regulations in the freight brokerage industry.
